kv16.9:5.3: Samāpattesiyaṃ upapattesiyaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena cittena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:5.6: nanu na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena na upapattesiyena cittena na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:5.8: Hañci na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena … pe …
kv16.9:5.10: ekārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:6.3: Samāpattesiyaṃ upapattesiyaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena cittena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttaṃ ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇanti?
kv16.9:6.6: nanu na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ, na samāpattesiyena cittena … pe …
kv16.9:6.10: Hañci na samāpattesiyaṃ na upapattesiyaṃ … pe …
kv16.9:6.12: ekavatthukaṃ ekārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:7.6: Hañci kāmāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv16.9:7.7: “rūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, arūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṃ arūpāvacaran”ti.
